AssignedCastDescription: 'Mechs assembling 'Mechs so that our 'Mechs can go to battle properly equipped. It might sound silly, but the Argo is a big ship and every bit of efficiency helps us.

Description.Details: Reduces the monthly upkeep of all stored inventory items by 5%. This includes equipment, weapons, salvaged 'Mechs and stored 'Mechs. An optimised inventory system for the Argo is an excellent start, but we can cut storage costs further. If you're willing to front the cost for a few, rugged WorkMechs, we'd save a ton of labour and time managing our storage. This will translate into cheaper storage costs in the long run.
Description.Name: Storage Space
